Uses of Class
ussr.description.Description

Packages that use Description
ussr.description.geometry Geometric shapes and properties for defining robots or obstacles in the simulated world. 
ussr.description.robot Basic building blocks for describing robots in terms of the individual components that make up the module, connectors mounted on each module, etc. 
ussr.description.setup Classes for defining the overall setup of the simulation. 
ussr.model An abstract model of a modular robot to be used from the controller. 
 

Uses of Description in ussr.description.geometry
 

Subclasses of Description in ussr.description.geometry
 class AtronShape
          A description of an ATRON half geometry, currently only includes a radius.
 class BoxShape
          A description of a box geometry for use in building a robot
 class ConeShape
          A description of a cone geometry for use in building a robot
 class CylinderShape
          A description of a cylinder geometry for use in building a robot
 class GeometryDescriptionImpl
          An implementation of the GeometryDescription interface that provides the copy operation.
 class SphereShape
          A description of a sphere geometry, for building a robot
 class VectorDescription
          A physics-engine independent description of a vector.
 

Uses of Description in ussr.description.robot
 

Subclasses of Description in ussr.description.robot
 class ConnectorDescription
          Description of a single connector, relative to the module component on which it is to be mounted
static class ConnectorDescription.Common
          Provide default values for connector properties that are common to several connectors
 class ModuleComponentDescription
          Description of a module component: one of the parts that makes up a complete module.
 class ReceivingDevice
          Abstract description of a receiving device
 class RobotDescription
          A description of the geometry of a complete robot module, including the shape of the core, the shape of a connector, and the positions of the connectors and their range.
 class TransmissionDevice
          Abstract description of a transmission device
 

Uses of Description in ussr.description.setup
 

Subclasses of Description in ussr.description.setup
 class WorldDescription
          The description of a world in which a number of robot modules can be placed for the simulation.
 

Uses of Description in ussr.model
 

Methods in ussr.model with parameters of type Description
 void Entity.readLabels(Description description)
          Read the labels stored in a description object, store each label as a property with key label:name and the name as a value
